quiz.q: A MEL Chapter 20 Special Operations Deferral may not be used for any normal LLM system component discrepancy. The LLM components must be:
a: Deferred under their normal chapter (eighter Chapter 34 or Chapter 22)

quiz.q: The chart in AMM Part 2 Chapter 22-00-00-2-0

a: Dependant on the availability of installed airborne equipment, and controlled through the normal Minimum Equipment (MEL) process.

quiz.q: If the pilot has reported unsatisfactory autopilot system operation that is not covered by the FIM:
a: AMM 22-00-00-2 specifies procedure 22-11-00-5, Task 22-11-00-730-801 must be performed

quiz.q: If an LLM qualified AMT performs maintenance activities to any of the LLM components listed in AMM 22-00-00-2-0:
a: The associated system test listed in the chart must be run, and must pass

quiz.q: If there is no deferral of any LLM required component, and no Chapter 20 deferral of CAT operations:
a: The aircraft is automatically set to CAT III

quiz.q: The Thrust Management (Auto-Throttle) function resides in the Airplane Information Management System(AIMS):
a: Core Processor Module (CPM)/Standard which is an LLM component

quiz.q: When an MEL is applied to an LLM required component or system:
a: The aircraft is automatically downgraded to the correct CAT status

quiz.q: Supplemental testing over and above what is specified in the FIM is:
The B777 does not have a comprehensive Autoland test because:
a: The level of monitoring and testing performed in the B777 make a comprehensive test unnecessary

quiz.q: The procedures described in the Boeing Fault Isolatoin Manual (FIM) provide...
An AMT must contact MOCC to place a Chapter 20 Deferral on the aircraft if:
a: The aircraft has demonstrated history of repeated failures related to CAT operation

quiz.q: When replacing lamps in the Mode Control Panel (MCP):
a: An LLM mechanic is required to change the lamps in order to retain CAT status

quiz.q: When a non-LLM qualified AMT performs maintenance on LLM components, a Chapter 20 Deferral is required (if the descrepancy is FACTed). The AMT:
a: Must contact MOCC to plcae a Chapter 20 deferral on the aircraft
